column1: The Purple Pig////- Grilled octopus $20 - this was the highlight of our meal! It seriously is A MUST TRY. I repeat A MUST TRY!!!! Words cannot describe how delicious and addicting this dish is. I know I probably sound like a broken record
column2: but it really was the perfect balance of flavors and textures with each bite better than the previous leaving you wanting for more. 5/5+ stars.
